summary: The diff implements the single-page tabbed UI with Number Info and Vehicle Info panels, uses React Query hooks to call the specified public APIs with caching, and applies a dark terminal-themed styling while referencing the required generated images. However, the required generated image files themselves are not shown as added, and the diff introduces Internet Identity/auth-related hooks and an (empty) backend canister file, which were explicitly non-goals/constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images to the project and render them in the UI as part of the hacker-themed design (served from frontend/public/assets/generated).
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the required image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
evidence: ADDED FILES list does not include frontend/public/assets/generated/hacker-bg.dim_1920x1080.png or frontend/public/assets/generated/hacker-mark.dim_256x256.png

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity authentication infrastructure (provider/hook) despite authentication being a stated non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication flows (Internet Identity) as non-goals, but the diff adds Internet Identity provider/hook usage and identity-dependent actor creation.
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (uses useInternetIdentity and creates actor with identity when authenticated)

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint says to keep the app as a simple frontend using provided public APIs and not introduce additional backend canisters; the diff adds a backend actor file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added caffeine.ai footer attribution and outbound referral link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements/non-goals; it is extra UI/content.
